title: November Lake: Teenage Detective
description: When 18-year-old police recruit, November Lake, joins training college, her curiosity and desire to solve mysteries soon has her investigating a series of creepy and chilling crimes.With the help of her friend and colleague, Kale Creed, November is soon caught up in a dark world of strange and inexplicable mysteries, each with a deadly twist.Three novella length mysteries in one The Dead Girl In The RoomThe Kidnapping at Blackwater FarmThe Menacing Stranger***'The November Lake Mysteries' (Book Two) Now Available!***These stories were first published in the 'Kiera Hudson Prequels' By Tim O'Rourke.
author: Jamie Drew
